name: Rat
content:
Traits

**Keen Smell**: The rat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

 Actions

**Bite**: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.
